divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at home, in the backyard, barbecuing. We like to scan the night sky andwe noticed what appeared to be a satellite. We enjoy spotting them. We wereconfident of what we thought we were seeing until it left our view andreappeared from a different direction. It came out of nowhere. It travelednorth, appeared to stop and hover, danced around, then stopped again, grewintensely brighter, like a lit magnesium strip, and then faded away.
Summary: appears like a satellite but lasts only 4-8 second
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Harlingen
There were no other sightings in Harlingen on or around March 29th 2002
